'''Lord Lawrence''' was a historical figure who lived a thousand years ago, during the time of [[Vennessa]]'s rebellion. At the time he was the leader of the [[Lawrence Clan]].<ref>{{Ref/Manga|0|pg=15}}</ref>

He is the father of [[Barca Lawrence]].<ref>{{Ref/Manga|0|pg=26}}</ref> Both have only appeared in the Prologue chapter of the official [[Manga]].
